applies_if_all_true: Residential customers having professional or commercial operations within an individual dwelling unit that meet all three qualifications
Portion of premises involving religious uses when non-religious uses are physically segregated and separately metered and billed, and customer elects to make necessary wiring changes
does_not_apply_if_true: Residential customers having professional or commercial operations within an individual dwelling unit that do not meet all three qualifications
Non-religious uses predominate and cannot be physically segregated and separately metered and billed
Portion of premises involving non-religious uses

classification_shift_rules: If non-religious uses predominate and can be physically segregated and separately metered and billed, religious use portion receives service under this classification and non-religious portion under appropriate non-residential classification
If non-religious uses predominate and cannot be physically segregated and separately metered and billed, entire premise receives service under appropriate non-residential classification
